page.title: 17EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The most popular things for children's parents to do are associated with public services.These jobs include postman,milkman,dustman, electrician,water board man,nurse doctor,dentist,shop assistants and many more.The next most common job is housewife which involves cleaning the house and looking after children.The third most popular occupation is farming which involves looking after animals and ploughing the fields.The next three jobs are about the same in popularity.The industrial jobs include factory work like making things and designing things.The next, is selfemployment.This worker will do jobs for people for money. Of the children in our school,only four children have both parents unemployed(or the single parent if they have only one parent).
